help1:
The next few prompts will ask about settings for environment variables you want.
Descriptions of these are in the Getting Started guide.
If you don't know what to set a variable to, just hit enter. You can edit
it later at setup/environment/[machine_name]_local.sh.

Press enter to continue...
help2:
The following things will only work if you have Docker installed. Docker is optional.

Press enter to continue...
help3:
The following options are for syncing with comet.ml and Google Sheets. They are optional.

Press enter to continue...
help4:
To complete setup, use the Getting Started guide to set up your 
environment variables if you didn't know what to put above. 

Press enter to complete setup...
